attributes.additional_details: We need to bring back capital punishment for those sick and twisted individuals who kill innocent children. At this time of austerity and government cuts, we are locking people up at huge expense to the tax paying people of this country, where they will be fed, watered, and live in general comfort for the rest of their lives. It is completely wrong, and anyone that kills a an innocent child deserves to die, it is an eye for an eye.
